DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective clinical study collect additional clinical data support FDA 510 ( k ) submission Topcon Specular Microscope SP-1P . The secondary objective evaluate adverse event find clinical study .
DOC.brief_title: Second Comparative Study Specular Microscopes Endothelial Corneal Cell Measurements
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria － NonPathologic Young Adults ( 1828 year old ) NonPathologic Adults ( 2980 year old ) : Male female subject 18 80 year old full legal capacity volunteer date inform consent sign ; Subjects follow instruction clinical staff clinical site , attend examination schedule examination date ; Subjects agree participate study . Inclusion Criteria － Pathologic Adults ( 2980 year old ) Male female subject 29 80 year old full legal capacity volunteer date inform consent sign ; Subjects follow instruction clinical staff clinical site , attend examination schedule examination date ; Subjects agree participate study ; At least one eye follow condition : History postop surgical trauma include Pseudophakic Aphakic bullous keratopathy ; History corneal transplant ; Physical injury trauma cornea ; Long term Fuch 's dystrophy , Guttata , corneal endothelial dystrophy Keratoconus ; Long term polymethyl methacrylate PMMA contact lens use ( great 3 year ) . Exclusion Criteria － NonPathologic Young Adults ( 1828 year old ) Non Pathologic Adults ( 2980 year old ) History postop surgical trauma include bullous keratopathy ; History corneal transplant ; Evidence physical injury trauma cornea ; Long term Fuch 's dystrophy , Guttata corneal endothelial dystrophy ; Keratoconus ; Long term PMMA contact lens use ( great 3 year ) ; History cataract , refractive ocular surgical procedure render cornea opaque otherwise impact ability image use investigational device ; Fixation problem may prevent obtain good quality SP1P CELLCHEK PLUS either eye . Exclusion Criteria － Pathologic Adults ( 2980 year old ) : History cataract , refractive ocular surgical procedure render cornea opaque otherwise impact ability image use investigational device ; Fixation problem may prevent obtain good quality SP1P CELLCHEK PLUS either eye .
